mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEDIA (article_id, media_type, media_url, media_name, file_size) VALUES ( #{articleId}, #{mediaType}, #{mediaUrl}, #{mediaName}, #{fileSize} )
mapper.select: SELECT article_id AS articleId, media_type AS mediaType, media_url AS mediaUrl, media_name AS mediaName, file_size AS fileSize, created_at AS createdAt FROM MEDIA WHERE article_id = #{articleId}
